    • Method Detail

      • getNetworkStatus

        public int getNetworkStatus(android.content.Context context)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkUtil
        Returns the current connection status. If you cannot detect granular network type, return NetworkUtil.UNMETERED if there is an internet connection or NetworkUtil.DISCONNECTED if there is no connection.
        Specified by:
        getNetworkStatus in interface NetworkUtil
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        Returns:
        The current connection status. It should be one of NetworkUtil.DISCONNECTED, NetworkUtil.METERED or NetworkUtil.UNMETERED.

      • setListener

        public void setListener(NetworkEventProvider.Listener listener)
        Specified by:
        setListener in interface NetworkEventProvider
